imdb.title: The Ordinarily Extraordinary Life of Robert Smalls
plot: The story of Robert Smalls, born into slavery and escaped to freedom on the C.S.S Planter. Fought in 17 Civil War battles, became a first-generation black politician and bought and died in the same house in which he was born into slavery.::Kristi Corbett
